mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NUM, MEMBER_ID, TITLE, REG_DATE, HIT FROM ( select rownum rn, NOTICE_NUM, MEMBER_ID, TITLE, REG_DATE, HIT from NOTICE where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ORDER BY NOTICE_NUM DESC ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} ORDER BY NOTICE_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICE_NUM, MEMBER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, FILES) VALUES (test_num_seq.nextval, 'admin', #{title}, #{content}, #{files})
